intro_bio: I'm currently a Junior at the University of Texas at Austin,
pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science.
My passions lie in full-stack development, machine learning,
and AI, along with a drive to push the boundaries of what's possible.

section.title: ~/About
section.description: Brief information about me and some of my interests.

bio: I am currently an undergraduate student at the University of Texas at Austin pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science. I have recently completed internships at Medex Surgical, where I developed an inventory management system, and iCode, where I taught STEM education and assisted students with learning programming languages such as Java and Python. I am also a Research Fellow at the Autonomous Robotics Laboratory, where I work on robotics programming using GPT-4, Python, and C++.

I have a strong interest in full-stack development, machine learning, and AI. I'm constantly looking for opportunities to apply my technical skills to impactful projects, like creating a Chrome extension using OpenAI’s GPT-3.5 or integrating AI into real-world applications. Outside of my technical work, I enjoy working out, watching anime, and spending time with family and friends.

section.title: ~/Education
section.description: Courses that I have completed or am on track to complete.

general.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

section.title: ~/Experience
section.description: My current/past relevant experience. Click [here](/resume) to view my resume.

experience_items.title: IT Intern
description: Developed a sophisticated inventory management system, leveraging VBA and Javascript automation techniques to enhance data accuracy and streamline operational workflows.
Created clear and detailed technical documents and user manuals, ensuring smooth adoption and effective use of the new system.

experience_items.title: Teacher Assistant
description: Promoted STEM education to 20+ students by teaching Java, Python, and HTML while effectively communicating complex technical concepts to individuals with varying skill levels.
Resolved a critical issue with the curriculum by quickly troubleshooting and adapting lesson plans, ensuring minimal disruption and allowing classes to continue smoothly.

experience_items.title: Research Fellow
description: Coordinated group tasks and worked alongside five students on writing code using GPT-4, Python, and C++ that enables robots to guide humans to designated nodes, eliminating the need for hard-coded directions.
Gained hands-on experience with test equipment and applied troubleshooting skills to resolve technical issues, ensuring the reliability of the robotic system.

section.title: ~/Projects
section.description: Some of my most recent or past favorite creations or work.

project_items.description: Developed a Chrome extension that utilizes OpenAI’s GPT-3.5-turbo to provide concise summaries of web pages, aimed at enhancing user productivity and information digestion. Implemented a user-friendly interface for inputting OpenAI API keys and viewing past summaries, laying the foundation for future enhancements and user feedback integration.

Built a full-stack pantry app with Next.js and Firebase, allowing users to manage inventory with real-time updates and secure authentication. Integrated LLaMA AI for smart recipe suggestions based on pantry contents, enhancing user experience with personalized recommendations. Designed a responsive UI for seamless interaction, leveraging JavaScript for dynamic functionality and Firebase for data synchronization.

Developed a recycling detection algorithm by integrating YOLO-8, OpenCV, and GPT-4 to determine what materials are recyclable alongside a team with three peers. Directed system testing using Azure Kinect Video Stream, validating the successful real-time object classification and achieving 78% detection accuracy.
